items.title: The oil CEO who stood up to Trump is a follower of the disciplined ‘Exxon way’ with a history of blunt statements
items.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

items.title: Buying a home is 150% more expensive than in 2019. But here’s why Trump’s plan to shut out institutional investors could raise costs even more
items.description: “Big investors have nothing to do with how the housing shortage got created,” says Ed Pinto, a leading housing expert.

items.title: Ascend Money wants to finance the 10 million-plus Thais currently being ignored by traditional banks stuck in the past
items.description: Ascend Money’s work providing financing to Thailand’s underbanked populations helped get the fintech company onto Fortune’s 2025 “Change the World” li...

items.title: Is Powell’s Fed head independence dead? It’s just one more diversionary trick as Trump outfoxes himself
items.description: You know what we're not talking about amid the latest Fed dustup? Trump's awful polling numbers, even among his own supporters.

items.title: Elon Musk says saving for retirement is irrelevant because AI is going to create a world of abundance: ‘It won’t matter’
items.description: Musk said a "supersonic tsunami" of AI and robotics will bring about a world of zero scarcity.
